segments.text: My attention keeps going back to that two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable, almost ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed out at such a dangerous angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can visualize the boy falling backward with a crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so intent on reaching those cookies, he doesn't seem to notice the wobble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for injury here is quite high, it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is wet, adding another layer of danger to the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he slips when he tries to get down?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so close, yet so far from intervening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a terrifying moment, suspended in this drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and steady that stool myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene fills me with a sense of dread for what might happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to secure that stool immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR
